alert.note: Alert for Rusk (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 10 at 6:24PM CDT until July 10 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN RUSK COUNTY... At 624 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hawkins to 6 miles north of Sheldon to 9 miles southeast of Weyerhaeuser, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Hawkins around 630 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Tony, Conrath, Rusk County Airport, Ingram and Glen Flora. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
